website_summaries.verdict: From Reebok’s sneaker collection came the Reebok DMX Series 1600, which was praised by many for its comfort and excellent quality. Buyers also loved the color options and the sneaker's unique style. As a result, many reviewers revealed that they highly recommend the model.Another positive point is the shoe’s affordable price of $120. However, the sizing was deemed to run large. It was also revealed to have a wider-than-usual fit. Lastly, one individual disliked the sneaker’s bulky look in contrast to other Reebok DMX shoes.
pros: The Reebok DMX Series 1600 is reasonably priced
This model comes in several colorways
More than a handful of users loved the color options, finding them to be nice, bold, and very colorful
It offers excellent comfort, attested a lot of reviewers
According to some purchasers, the Reebok DMX Series 1600 is of high quality and durable construction
Many buyers would recommend this kick to others
Several wearers commended the sneaker for its look, which they found to be great, unique, and attractive
cons: The Reebok DMX Series 1600 runs large, revealed plenty of commenters
Several users complained that the shoe runs wide
One purchaser didn’t like that the model was bulky, unlike the other DMX models that he had

customer_reviews.title: Not nike
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. After the latest nike insults, I will buy these exclusively.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The best DMX shoes out there.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect and look very cool. I own 6 different types of DMX shoes and these are the best. They are great for ppl with a little wider feet. I own 2 colorways of these shoes cause they fit so good. Just wish they came in more black and white colorways.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very bouncy
customer_reviews.text: If you like a stiff sole, this is not it. If you like bouncy shoes, you are in business. Due to the bouncy-ness, i would likely not do heavy squats with them at the gym for of killing the bouncy feel! The fit is to size, I am 9.5D & it is good!
customer_reviews.author: Arctic Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Rocks...
customer_reviews.text: I feel like a kid with new shoes. I love these shoes they fit perfectly at size 11. Plus I am not supporting Nikes BS.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Harmon

customer_reviews.title: The weirdest yet coolest shoes I have!
customer_reviews.text: I've been sitting on these shoes for a while and finally ordered them. these shoes are by far the weirdest shoes I've ever owned. I am a women's 7.5/8 so I ordered a 5.5 but with how narrow the shoe is I could have went up to a size 6. All in All its a pretty good shoe that seems like it'll hold up. When I walk in it, it gives me a little bit of a bounce which I'm not use to.
customer_reviews.author: Kota

customer_reviews.title: Not a good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: It fits well, is comfortable, but, after about a months wear (I don't wear them every day), the leather(?) shoe string hole ripped apart. I fixed it, but I was expecting something better from this expensive Reebok shoe. They're kind of like Skechers when it comes to durability.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Looks good that's it
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the comfortability. They look nice sitting on my shelf collecting dust
customer_reviews.author: Super

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a very sturdy sneaker very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Had for a few weeks now Seems to be a very sturdy sneaker very pleased
customer_reviews.author: D.trick

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but a bit bulky
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was good and comfortable but a bit bulky for my taste. Also, had this one spot that kept hitting my right foot.
customer_reviews.author: Shubz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured but after 30 days and only wearing them 3 times the yellow is fading making the shoe look dirty....
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Your feet will hurt as they look good but have no front padding.....waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's DMX Series 1600 Cross Trainer
product_meta.description: In 1958, Reebok was established and name after an African Gazelle. Reebok is now on the biggest athletic companies and has expanded into casual wear as well. Collaborating lifestyle and sports, Reebok emphasizes on having fun and staying in shape.
